body: Ha.. Hahahaha. Hahahahahahahahaha. Miu got hooked up with a lesbian by her unintentionally perverted brother. That's what you get for treating your older brother like a god damn tool, you get some sex with a lesbian who had secret feelings for you... Damn now I want that to happen to me. Have a twin brother have sex with someone, then have that someone want sex with me. Fantasies are fantasies.
